title: Amazon Black Friday deals 2023 | The best cycling deals you can get right now
content:
Retail giant Amazon sells every type of product imaginable, and that includes bikes and cycling accessories.

Amazon has now launched its Black Friday cycling deals and there’s heavy discounting on indoor trainers, winter kit and accessories.

We’ve trawled Amazon to get the best pre-Black Friday cycling deals, which give a taster of the delectable discounts to come.

Otherwise, check out our round-up of the best Black Friday bike deals, plus the latest offers on Garmin computers, smartwatches and bike lights.

Garmin Index S2 Smart Scale – £129.99 £89.99 (save 31%)

Oscar Huckle / Our Media

The Garmin Index S2 Smart Scales can tell you your body fat percentage, skeletal muscle mass, bone mass and body water percentage, in addition to your weight.

The scales feature built-in WiFi so all your data can automatically sync with the Garmin Connect app.

The Index S2 Smart Scales are on offer this Black Friday in both black and white.

  • Buy the Garmin Index S2 Smart Scales on Amazon for £89.99

Garmin Varia RTL515 Rearview Cycling Radar – £169.99 £129.99 (save 24%)

Garmin

Rearview radar bike lights will alert you to any vehicles approaching you from behind.

The Garmin RLT515 radar incorporates a taillight and can be paired with your Edge bike computer.

Garmin says it can also be used as a daytime running light, claiming it can provide visibility up to one mile.

  • Buy the Garmin Varia RTL515 on Amazon for £129.99

Topeak Smart D2 Digital Gauge – £32.99 £20.99 (save 36%)

James Huang/BikeRadar

Tyre pressure gauges help you ensure you have the exact amount of air you are aiming for in each tyre, offering greater accuracy than a traditional track pump.

Topeak’s Smart D2 gauge can read up to 250psi and will work with both Presta and Schrader valves on mountain bike tyres, suspension forks and rear shocks.

  • Buy the Topeak Smart D2 Digital Gauge on Amazon for £20.99

Where to find the best Black Friday cycling deals

Black Friday is here! Take a look below for a run-down of which retailers and brands have launched the best Black Friday sales.

Black Friday cycling deals: quick links

  • Amazon – The retail giant has Black Friday discounts throughout November
  • Wiggle – Wiggle has Black Friday deals on a whole range of cycling kit
  • ProBikeKit – Big Black Friday savings in the UK and US
  • Halfords – A wide range of Black Friday deals online, including discounts on nearly 100 cycling products
  • Tredz – ‘Black Ticket’ event with significant discounts on ‘nearly new’ ex-demo and ex-display bikes 
  • Sigma Sports – Save up to 40% on a wide range of products, including clothing, helmets, smart trainers and cycling shoes
  • Competitive Cyclist – Save big in November if you’re in the US
  • Chain Reaction Cycles – New Black Friday deals released weekly
  • Currys – The store’s Black Friday sale is underway
  • eBay – Reductions galore in the auction site’s Black Friday sale

Moon Nebula rear light – £23.99 £18.49 (save 23%)

Dave Caudery / Immediate Media

Moon’s Nebula rear light sports eight modes and can dish out up to 200 lumens.

You get a daytime flash mode and the light can run up to 25 hours. The quick-release mount ensures it can mount on a range of seatposts, or on the back of your saddle and it even comes with a belt clip.

  • Buy the Moon Nebula rear light on Amazon for £18.49

Peaty’s Complete Bicycle Cleaning Kit – £79.99 £56.99 (save 29%)

Peaty's

This complete cleaning kit from Peaty’s includes everything you’ll need to keep your bike running in tip-top condition.

In the kit, you get Peaty’s Loam Foam bike cleaner, a 500ml bottle of Foaming Degreaser and a 60ml bottle of the brand’s Link Lube All-Weather. You also get two brushes and a cleaning cloth.

Everything’s neatly stored in a recycled plastic box with an aluminium carry handle.

  • Buy the Peaty’s Complete Bicycle Cleaning Kit on Amazon for £56.99

Park Tool DAG 2.2 Derailleur Hanger Alignment Gauge – £65.99 £56.09 (save 15%)

David Rome / Immediate Media

The derailleur hanger is a sacrificial part that connects the rear derailleur to the frame’s dropout and is designed to bend and break in an impact. From time to time, they can take a knock and if you’re experiencing poor shifting, it’s worth checking if the hanger is optimally aligned.

Park Tool’s DAG 2.2 is a shop-quality hanger alignment gauge that lets you not only diagnose but also straighten a bent derailleur hanger if required.

  • Buy the Park Tool DAG 2.2 on Amazon for £56.09

Park Tool OM-1 Bench Top Overhaul Mat – £31.99 £23.48 (save 27%)

Park Tool

A bench mat is an invaluable accessory for keeping small parts organised when servicing headset bearings, hubs or pedals, for example.

The textured areas keep small parts in place and the divided sections mean you won’t mix anything up. As well as looking good on your workbench, Park Tool says the rubber construction cleans easily.

  • Buy the Park Tool OM-1 on Amazon for £23.48

Muc-Off Wet Lube – £9.62 £7.50 (save 22%)

Zetland Cycles / Immediate Media

Muc-Off’s Wet Lube is a tried-and-tested chain lube, with the brand claiming the specific formula excels over long distances in wet or muddy conditions. It currently has 22 per cent on Amazon.

  • Buy the Muc-Off Wet Lube on Amazon for £7.50

Sealskinz Waterproof All Weather Mid Length Sock – £38 £29.99 (save 21%)

Sealskinz

If you don’t have a pair of the best overshoes or winter cycling shoes, waterproof socks are another option to keep your feet warm and dry in cold weather.

These mid-length cycling socks fuse a hydrophilic membrane between a merino wool interior and a nylon blend exterior.

  • Buy the Sealskinz Waterproof All Weather Mid Length socks on Amazon for £29.99

Gore Wear Spirit winter cycling jacket – £149.99 £92.98 (save 38%)

Amazon

The Spirit is a Gore-Tex Infinium-lined windproof and water-resistant winter cycling jacket designed for a wide range of conditions.

The jacket is available with a hefty 51 per cent discount in four different colours.

It’s rare to see cycling jackets discounted so heavily in the winter and stock is limited, so we’d recommend acting quickly on this one.

  • Buy the Gore Wear Spirit jacket from Amazon for £92.98

Kryptonite Evolution chain lock – £99.20 £57.99 (save 42%)

Amazon

If you want to keep your bike safe, you could do worse than a big ol’ Kryptonite chain.

Kryptonite makes some of the best bike locks on the market, with the Evolution scoring 8/10 on the brand’s own security ratings. Paired with a solid U-lock, this will be a formidable opponent for any bike thief.

  • Buy the Kryptonite Evolution chain lock from Amazon for £57.99

Wahoo Kickr Core – £549.99 £499.99 (save 9%)

Our Media

The Wahoo Kickr Core was last updated in 2019, but it’s still a good choice today.

It’s available on Amazon now with a modest 9 per cent saving on the RRP, as quoted by Amazon.

Other sites (such as Tredz) have the RRP at £699.99, but are also selling the smart trainer for £499.99, so it’s actually a 28.57 per cent saving if you believe them.

  • Buy the Wahoo Kickr Core from Amazon for £499.99

Shokz OpenRun bone conduction headphones – £129.95 £103.99 (save 20%)

Our Media

Shokz’ OpenRun are among the best headphones for cycling who want to groove on the move while maintaining awareness of traffic.

Deals are few and far between on these, but they can be had with a 20 per cent discount if purchased via TradeInn on Amazon.

  • Buy the Shokz OpenRun bone conduction headphones on Amazon for £103.99
author: Jack Luke
